

### 要求

![image-20240108142759998](https://javapub-common-oss.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/javapub/202401081428797.png)





### src20转账实例

```bash
curl --user username --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id": "curltest", "method": "getrawtransaction", "params": ["50aeb77245a9483a5b077e4e7506c331dc2f628c22046e7d2b4c6ad6c6236ae1", true]}' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:8332/
```

结果：
